entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests fails on CI #107381
  • System.Text.Json Trim Warning - 'System.Exception.TargetSite.get' which has 'RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute' #107375
  • Stack Walk fails in non-full dumps of a SingleFile process #107374
  • [API Proposal]: MaxOrDefault, MinOrDefault #107370
  • JsonStringEnumMemberNameAttribute does not support empty strings. #107367
  • [9.0] Test assert failure in X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.AiaTests.AiaAcceptsCertTypesAndIgnoresNonCertTypes #107364
    9.0.0
  • PKCS7 CMS Decryption failed when using certificates with Elliptic Curve keys. #107363
  • Test failure: NuGet.RestoreEx.targets at "NuGet.NoAllocEnumerateExtensions.OptimisticallyNonAllocatingEnumerable" #107361
  • JSON-(de)serialize Base64 string as ImmutableArray<byte> #107352
  • [Infra][NativeAOT-iOS] Runtime tests workitems not getting sent to helix #107346
  • Issues with memory dumps and Single File App #107344
  • Transient high severity vulnerability (System.Text.Json) in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json #107342
  • [WASI] failing System.Net.NameResolution tests #107339
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.PreserializedResourceWriterTests.CanReadViaResourceManager #107332
  • Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Tests.InvalidEnumArgumentExceptionTests.Ctor_SerializationInfo_StreamingContext #107331

Closed

  • Antigen failure: `Assert failure: Assertion failed 'arg->OperIsPutArg()` #105412
    9.0.0
  • JIT: We should be able to avoid covariance checks when inlining with exact types #107080
    10.0.0
  • JIT doesn't see real type of field in a shared generic type with exact context #96787
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 12 Regressions on 8/15/2024 12:39:36 AM #106706
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 13 Regressions on 1/25/2024 1:30:33 AM #97714
    9.0.0
  • Test failure "RemoteExecutionException : Half-way through waiting for remote process." in System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest #106494
    10.0.0
  • "Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program." Exception encountered - on "(dynamic)" method call for overload resolution #82239
  • High Memory Consumption with Server GC Enabled #107345
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Bmi1.BitFieldExtract` #105820
    9.0.0
  • Build AOT static library for Windows on Linux fails. #107336
  • How to build NativeAOT for Android under Linux (Docker) #107337
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regression in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Basic on 8/19/2024 8:38:43 PM #107044
    9.0.0
  • DocComment XML not shipping in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 9.0.100-rc1 #106825
    9.0.0
  • Bug in IntersectBy, ExceptBy, ... :only gives the first element of the source collection #107338
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.ConnectionClosedByPeer_WithPendingAcceptAndConnect_PendingAndSubsequentThrowConnectionAbortedException #106941
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.AcceptStreamAsync_ConnectionDisposed_Throws #106942
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.DisposeAfterCloseCanceled #106943
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingCallbackOde_KeepRunning #106944
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.TwoListenersOnSamePort_DisjointAlpn_Success #106945
    Future
  • HttpClientHandler ClientCertificates ignored on HTTP 3 #107294
  • iOS-sim PhysicalFileProviderTests.TokenForEmptyFilter test failure #107246
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.pdb not found #107285
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonStringEnumConverter handles duplicate enum members inconsistently #107296
  • CertificateRequest.Create(...) hangs on macOS 12.7.5 x64 #105438
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting has a transitive vulnerability (System.Text.Json) #107141
  • Add support for SHA256 thumbprints not supported in X509Certificate2Collection.Find #107330
  • Fuzzlyn: Debug/Release diffs for `LeadingZeroCount` and `TrailingZeroCount` intrinsics #107327
    9.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Debug/Release diffs for `Avx.Test*` intrinsics #107328
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator doesn't call setters in same way reflection based ConfigurationBinder does #96873
    9.0.0
  • Globalization Invariant Mode string compare issue #106828
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ILLink support for field init substitutions #107380
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add missing documentation for new 9.0 APIs in System.IO #107376
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix meter/instrument filtering in MetricsEventSource #107373
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.CodeDom package readme #107372
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop canonicalization #107371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Binary writer fix #107369
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Fix bugs discovered by the fuzzer #107368
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Build NativeAOT-iOS runtime tests as standalone to restore test runs #107366
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve PipeReader.AdvanceTo(consumed) when bytes have been examined already #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono] Re-enable HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS for non-amd64 Mono #107358
    NO-MERGE, arch-arm64, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Use SearchValues in Uri.CheckForUnicodeOrEscapedUnreserved #107357
    area-System.Net
  • [release/9.0] Run stress pipelines on release/9.0 #107356
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] ComponentModel threading fixes #107354
    Servicing-consider, area-System.ComponentModel, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] ComponentModel threading fixes #107353
    Servicing-consider, area-System.ComponentModel, 8.0.x
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assumption in `fgExpandRarelyRunBlocks` #107350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ci] Include PDBs from runtime pack when building on Helix if required #107348
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Consider necessary EETypes with metadata constructed #107347
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support disclaimer to data-formats.md #107341
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Do not over-align code when JitAlignLoops=0 is set #107340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #107333
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove PointerNativeTypeAssignmentRewriter by introducing a separate local with the exact type and assigning to/from it #107219
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Provide System.Composition.AttributedModel package readme #106781
    area-System.Composition
  • Make `DomainAssembly` create its `Assembly` in its constructor and remove separate allocate load level #107224
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106341
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix CrossGen2SynthesizePgo on Windows #107362
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #107035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix docs file names and add validation #107359
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Disable MemoryStream_SeekOverflow_Throws on Linux #107298
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • Stop referencing S.R.Metadata directly #107343
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that Vector128.CreateSequence works on x86 for non-constant 64-bit inputs #107147
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure required properties are validated before invoking the deserialization constructor. #107126
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix meter/instrument filtering in MetricsEventSource #107267
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #107039
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Fix getting SSP for threadabort in funceval #107320
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update size of LDAP `BerVal.bv_len` struct on unix #107295
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix calling property setter In in the Configuration source generator #107329
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix bug in validating unused bits #107321
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory
  • [wasm] Generate bailouts for switch opcodes in jiterpreter instead of aborting #107323
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • revert XUNIT_HIDE_PASSING_OUTPUT_DIAGNOSTICS #107349
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2530472 #106995
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107249
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix docs file names and add validation #107334
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #106841
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #106877
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.10
  • Run stress pipelines on release/9.0 #107355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Put handling of sized ref handles under FEATURE_SIZED_REF_HANDLES #107326
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WASI] platform specific assemblies and fixes for testing #107196
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Make jiterpreter module size limit configurable + clean up technical debt #107318
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Provide System.Composition.Convention package readme #106782
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Hosting package readme #106783
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Runtime package readme #106784
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.TypedParts package readme #106785
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Fix calling property setter In in the Configuration source generator #107057
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix string case-insensitive comparisons in Globalization invariant mode #107311
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport Azure Linux test changes #107061
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.10
  • Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #106716
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow reporting with multiple PALs #107264
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix access to hoisted variables from reductions #104360
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2531191 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Check CancellationToken before TimeSpan in TimeProviderTaskExtensions #107009
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • Empty slice fix #107316
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for left-shift intrinsics #107322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Update ABI doc #107286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove ActiveIssue for resolved issues in Vector tests #107127
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Reduce net core app current package dependencies #107161
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.10
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/9.0][no-merge][testing][Android] Run runtime and libraries tests on different Android API version #106951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Enable range-based for over ABI passing segments #107174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Added documentation for binding most of the Swift types #2678
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial version of the managed stack traces on Browser #2677

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove EnableUnsafeBinaryFormatterSerialization setting in default runtimeconfig.json #43228
  • Runtime error with Blazor Server projects that include an MSBuild target depending on the CoreBuild target. (.NET SDK Preview 7) #43225
  • Debugging a .NET 8 App on Android 5 and 6 launches Intent Resolver Activity #43223
  • Cannot update workloads #43210
  • NET9-pr7 x86 AOT Some Registry Missing #43208
  • `dotnet run --tl:on` interpreted as application argument #43207
  • Pdb file for assembly /usr/local/share/dotnet/x64/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/8.0.8/System.Private.CoreLib.dll was not found or failed to read #43206

PullRequests

Created

  • Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43234
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add storage location to key vault config #43232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix feature band when assigning a workload to a workload install type #43231
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update dotnet test protocol messages #43226
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Summary of how we do localization in this repo #43202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Allow roslyn binary into VMR #43205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Expose endpoint manifest type #43167
    untriaged
  • Warn when NuGetPackageRoot is empty but needed for the toolset compiler #43119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Dev Device ID #43148
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Telemetry, 9.0.1xx
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #43199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add "buildPass" parameter to vmr-build jobs templates #43193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issues with Blazor WASM delta applier #43152
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix the minimum supported version for targeting net9 #43142
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Shutdown toolset compilers #43135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43099
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, 9.0.1xx
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43196
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
    Working Set
  • Consider relaxing restrictions of async methods in blocks that do not contain `await`. #1331
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Method group natural type improvements #7429
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • [Proposal]: Type inference using method group natural type #7687

PullRequests

Updated

  • Field keyword/updates #8398
  • Update the params proposal in line with the new betterness rules #8393

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AbstractPackage should switch to main thread before calling IsActive = true #74995
  • API: Analyzer redirecting #74989
  • Breaking change in nullability analysis of inferred type argument #74987

Closed

  • Emission of NullabilityAttribute(2) on unconstrained generic type parameters causes incorrect runtime reporting of nullability in .NET 9 #74837
  • Deconstruct works inconsistently in patterns and in deconstruction into tuple #74852
  • Avoid dependency on `System.Index` for list patterns #74983

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove debug-only assert method #74996
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid BuildHost crash in Mono due to missing types #74994
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove toolset compiler workarounds #74990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Find first potential editorconfig when trying to synchronize #74986
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore workspaces that do not have IEditAndContinueWorkspaceService #73861
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #74985
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Mark "ref struct interfaces" as shipped in C# 13 #74991
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Add `Conversion.IsSpan` public API #74731
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Expose Go To Impl and Spell Check to Razor #74978
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Fixup partial property API usage #74951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid BuildHost crash in Mono due to missing types #74392
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unused code #74984
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize usage of `Stack<T>` in SyntaxNavigator #74813
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Re-enable double-to-integer conversion tests #74980
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #57696
  • Perf improvement: https #57695
  • Unity DI fails to instantiate EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider in .NET 8 #57694
  • Mod Rewrite - RewriteRule - redirections with full host names doesn't work #57693
  • TempData type detection #57692
  • ForwardedHeadersMiddleware seems not to pick up original host from Azure App Gateway #57687

Closed

  • [Blazor] Provide a better error message when an asset is not found because the environment is `Production` and the app has not been published. #57449
    9.0-rc2
  • JwtBearerHandler should trigger OnAuthenticationFailed event, even when there is no Token in Authorization header #57636
  • Page calls dispose immediately after first render #57681
  • Perf improvement: json #57673
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json #57680

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable NuGet Audit #57698
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Static Assets] Improve development experience #57671
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24452.3 #57663
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Disable launching browser on Web API template #57682
    area-mvc
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:

Created

  • Scaffold-DbContext: Data annotation for [TimeStamp] is not generated #34609

  • `Sqlite:Autoincrement` is not generated for key column when the entity has owned property #34608
    Backlog

Closed

  • Feature request: ability to configure a default `CancellationToken` for `async` EF Core operations #34612
  • Executing Migrator by having an ambient transaction #31507
    Backlog
  • Support TransactionScope in IExecutionStrategy extensions #34586
  • EFCore 9 preview 7 - 'Specify caching for sequences' support has been removed #34551
  • migrationBuilder.InsertData should return SELECT scope_identity() to get LAST INSERT ID #34607
  • Behavior of multiple "Merge Using" statements in a single command #34610

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Update Azure.Identity version #34605
  • [release/9.0] Update Mono.TextTemplating and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis to non-preview versions #34606

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34572
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34581
  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL #34171
